quotes: On 19 February at the Munich Security Conference, Stoltenberg remarked that despite NATO's 'strong diplomatic efforts to find a political solution [to the Russo-Ukrainian war]... we have seen no sign of withdrawal or de-escalation so far.
On 21 February 2022, Stoltenberg condemned Russia's diplomatic recognition of two self-proclaimed separatist republics in Donbas.
On 4 March 2022, Stoltenberg said NATO would not establish a no-fly zone over Ukraine.
On 8 March 2022, Stoltenberg warned that if there is any Russia's attack 'against any NATO country, NATO territory, that will trigger Article 5' of the North Atlantic Treaty.

quotes: [Putin] wants to limit NATO's right to collective defence... and demands that we should remove all our forces and infrastructure from the countries that joined NATO after the fall of the Berlin Wall...
